name: Chain Gang Chase : OUYA & Desktop
blurb: Play with up to seven friends as convicts, chained together, running for freedom in this couch co-op game for OUYA and Desktop.

rewards.reward: CRIMINAL RECORD ============================== As a thanks for backing us, we'll put your name in the final game, in the Production Book, and on our website! You will also receive an invitation to our Rochester, NY launch party.

WELCOME TO THE GANG ============================== You get an unlock code for all of the platforms on which we ever release the game. Our current plans include OUYA and PC/Linux/Mac. We may grow to Android, Web, and iOS. ============================== + the previous tier!

INNER CIRCLE CELLMATE ============================== You get exclusive access to our Developer Blogs and weekly Hangout On Air sessions with the team. ============================== + all previous tiers!

PRISON BOOKIE ============================== You get a digital copy of our Production Book, which includes process work, team mugshots, backer mugshots, and the list of all backers! ============================== + all previous tiers!

WENT TO JAIL AND ALL I GOT WAS THIS T-SHIRT ============================== We recognize that some people just want the game and a T-Shirt, without the rest of the bundled perks. Backing this reward is like adding a T-Shirt to the WELCOME TO THE GANG tier. ============================== NOTE: This reward is not included in higher tiers!
CONVICT CONCERTO ============================== You get a digital copy of our Soundtrack with Voice-Over Bloopers. ============================== + all previous tiers!

PAROLE HEARING ============================== You get beta access, plus access to all other release platforms a full 2 weeks ahead of everyone else's sentence. ============================== + all previous tiers!
PRISON TATTOUYA ============================== You get a very special Chain Gang Chase custom OUYA Skin! ============================== + all previous tiers!
EARLY JAILBIRD ============================== You get the CARE PACKAGE reward (see below) at a sweet price. ============================== + all previous tiers!

CARE PACKAGE ============================== You get an physical autographed copy of our Production Book, a Soundtrack, a Survival Bracelet, some Custom Temporary Tattoos, plus some "special" surprises! ;-) ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!
UNIFORM ============================== You get everything from the CARE PACKAGE, plus a T-Shirt. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!

24601!!!!! ============================== You get your alias and mug shot onto the final game's character selection screen. Your alias and likeness will appear with your back-story in the Production Book. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!

ROOKIE COP ============================== You get your alias and likeness into the final game as one of the Sheriff's Deputies. Players will fear you! Your alias and likeness will appear with your back-story in the Production Book. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!

THE LAW ============================== You get your alias and likeness into the final game as the Sheriff. Players will be TERRIFIED of you! Your alias and likeness will appear with your back-story in the Production Book. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!
AT LARGE ============================== You get V.I.P. treatment and special recognition at our launch party in May. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!

MOST WANTED ============================== In appreciation for this most generous backing, we will organize your transportation, meals, and accommodations for our launch party in May. You will also spend a day with our development team and have our eternal unwavering appreciation. ============================== + all previous (non-limited) tiers!
